```{asis, echo = {{summary_char_knit}}, eval = {{summary_char_knit}}, include = {{summary_char_knit}}}
Summarise the characteristics of the original data and data with excluded studies.
```

```{r, echo = {{summary_char_knit}}, include = {{summary_char_knit}}}
summary_df_all <- summary_char(bugsnet_all, outcome)
summary_df_sub <- summary_char(bugsnet_sub, outcome)
summary_df_compare <- data.frame(summary_df_all$Value, summary_df_sub$Value)
colnames(summary_df_compare) <- c("All studies", "With selected studies excluded")
rownames(summary_df_compare) <- summary_df_all$Characteristic

knitr::kable(summary_df_compare, row.names = TRUE, caption = "Comparison of study characteristics")
```
